body: This is unsafe if `index` is not a constant. It would be better to use`.value().toInt()` which would throw in that case. The check doesn't cost much but will save us a lot of time in the future if this invariant were to change (the current code will read uninitialized memory silently).
body_html: This is unsafe if index is not a constant. It would be better to use.value().toInt() which would throw in that case. The check doesn't cost much but will save us a lot of time in the future if this invariant were to change (the current code will read uninitialized memory silently).
body_text: This is unsafe if index is not a constant. It would be better to use.value().toInt() which would throw in that case. The check doesn't cost much but will save us a lot of time in the future if this invariant were to change (the current code will read uninitialized memory silently).
